Content:
It was a pleasure to welcome refugee families from Afghanistan, Syria, and Sudan. Around 230 people visited us in late Feb to connect with others, have some fun and meet some of our animal residents.  

We worked with Bristol-based charity @Bridgestweets to organise these visits. https://t.co/PthMGLQU89
